pages.text: The $(mob)Myrmex Royal$() is a monster that appears in $(thing)Myrmex Hives$(). Once hatched it will fly out of its colony to seek out another $(mob)Myrmex Royal$() to mate with, attacking players and animals it finds along the way with its bite and its venomous stinger. When it finds a suitable mate, they will both fall to the ground. One of them dies, while the other turns into a $(l:iceandfire_myrmex_queen)$(mob)Myrmex Queen$() that will dig out its new $(thing)Myrmex Hive$().
